articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets New Pakistani Ambassador
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Arif Mahmood, new ambassador of Pakistan to the DPRK, Tuesday when the latter paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.

articles.title: Indian Govt Cultural Delegation Here
articles.content:
Indian Govt Cultural Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A government cultural delegation of India headed by Secretary of the Ministry of Culture Jawhar Sircar arrived here Tuesday by air.

articles.title: NRC Accuses S. Korea of Using "North Defectors" for Smear Campaign
articles.content:
NRC Accuses S. Korea of Using "North Defectors" for Smear Campaign
Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the National Reconciliation Council (NRC) released the following statement Tuesday to denounce the south Korean puppet conservative group for its recent frantic anti-DPRK smear campaign:
					 The puppet conservative group, obsessed by an anti-DPRK confrontation ruckus, is using even human scum including defectors to the south as a shock brigade in escalating it only to be jeered by the public at home and abroad.
					
					 The group whipped together such riff-raffs as defectors to the south, calling them "future forces for unification". It is busy fabricating what it called the "Alliance for the Movement of Free North", the "Solidarity of NK Intellectuals" and other anti-DPRK plot-breeding organizations. It is even contemplating organizing a preparatory committee for forming a political party called the "Solidarity of Persons for Unification" and letting its candidate to run for the elections to "local self-governing bodies".
					
					 This group also drastically increased a budget for "assisting defectors from the north" while cutting down a budget for cooperation with the DPRK and set up "Hana centers" in more areas of south Korea as centers for brainwashing "defectors from the north" and educating them in conspiratorial plots against the DPRK. What is all the more disgusting is that Hyon In Thaek, minister of "Unification", and other persons in authority are paying visits to those who defected to the south to "congratulate", "encourage" and "support" them.
					
					 In another development, the group even let "defectors from the north" to conduct various forms of anti-DPRK smear campaigns such as "broadcasting for reforms in the north", "broadcasting for leading the north to opening" and "daily NK" in a bid to utter a spate of anti-DPRK vituperation. It also made them visit puppet army units and even foreign countries so that they might appear in "security lectures" and "seminars" and at "interviews" to hurl mud at the DPRK. And it instigated them to scatter leaflets, stage such foolish anti-DPRK charade as "opera" and "art performances" and publication of novels and memoirs.
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the puppet group has made no scruple of hurting the supreme headquarters of the DPRK, not content with raising a hue and cry over its situation while working with blood-shot eyes to spy it with human scum involved.
					
					 High-ranking officials of the U.S. are inviting renegades and defectors to the White House and Capitol Hill to award "prizes" to them. The anti-DPRK human rights organizations in the U.S. are even providing strong financial backing to the "defectors from the north" in their activities.
					
					 The same is the case with the Japanese reactionaries. They called on human scum in south Korea or "invited" them to come to meet them and let the official media echo their rhetoric.
					
					 Under the patronage of the puppet conservative group and the U.S. and Japan, those who fled to south Korea and the U.S. are letting loose all sorts of vituperation while taking an active part in the anti-DPRK smear campaigns in a bid to get small rewards and prolong their dirty remaining days.
					
					 By nature, what renegades and traitors utter is nothing but sheer fabrication devoid of official credibility as it is designed to please their patrons in an effort to prolong their dirty remaining days and no one, therefore, will lend an ear to such rubbish.
					
					 It is as clear as a pikestaff that betes noires will make only vituperation just as a crow will never be whiter for often washing.
					
					 The groundless mud-slinging made by those human scum who have become living corpses as politicians censured by the people for their despicable acts of treachery and those anti-DPRK plot breeders who rely on them only betrays their wretched plight as betes noires.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet group pretend to be considerate of the above-said human scum under the signboard of "human rights," calling them "refugees" but it is a well-known fact that those "defectors from the north" are criminals who fled the DPRK after committing crimes and wicked traitors to the nation and wretched betes noires who abandoned their families, parents, brothers and sisters and friends in quest of their own comfort.
					
					 They once praised benevolent policies enforced under socialism such as free education and free medical care but, finding it difficult to make a living due to the desperate moves of enemies inside and outside south Korea, they left the DPRK and their families in quest of their own luxury. They, indeed, deserve the worst curse for having thrown away even an iota of human conscience and morality.
					
					 Irony is that the puppet group and even the U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries are finding themselves in such awkward position as to depend on such human scum in their anti-DPRK smear campaigns. This reminds one of a drowning man catching at a straw.
					
					 This only implies their bitter defeat in the confrontation with the DPRK. It is needless to say that the more thoroughly the DPRK remains cleared of such human rubbish as "defectors from the north," the more clean it will become and stronger the single-minded unity of its people will get.
					
					 The puppet group and the U.S. and Japan should bear in mind that their desperate moves to seduce, allure and abduct Koreans and abuse them for smear propaganda campaign will bring them nothing but a miserable end as they are bound to end up losing their face and inviting derision.
					
					 The council, upon authorization, seriously warns in the name of the DPRK and the Korean nation that those dirty renegades and defectors will be forced to stand stern trials by the nation before anybody else as they act a shock brigade in carrying out the smear propaganda against the DPRK after going to the fold of the enemies keen on doing harm to fellow countrymen, forgetful of the care under which they were brought up and the disturbers of their system and life.
					
					 The people of the DPRK and the entire Korean nation will never pardon those wicked human scum busy carrying out the anti-DPRK scenarios worked out by the puppet conservative group and the U.S. and Japanese reactionaries and acting cat's paws of anti-reunification elements at home and abroad.

articles.title: Chairman of Cambodian Parliamentary Group Interviewed
articles.content:
Chairman of Cambodian Parliamentary Group Interviewed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Som Chen, chairman of the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group who is leading its delegation on a visit to the DPRK, had an interview with KCNA at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Monday.
					 Highly praising the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, the chairman said:
					
					 During the stay, we visited various places associated with the leadership of Kim Il Sung, the peerlessly great man, and came to know well about his career.
					
					 He embarked on the road of revolution in his early years to liberate the country.
					
					 His family members devoted their all to the country and the people.
					
					 He could grow to be a great revolutionary as he was born into such family.
					
					 He is the peerless patriot and the father of socialist Korea.
					
					 He founded the immortal Juche idea clarifying the philosophical principle that man is the master of his destiny and has power to carve out his own destiny.
					
					 The Juche idea serves as the guidelines for the revolution and construction.
					
					 The Korean people could bring about the present reality in this land as they advanced under the banner of this idea.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Il Sung for the human cause of independence will remain forever.

articles.title: More Poems Praising Kim Il Sung Discovered
articles.content:
More Poems Praising Kim Il Sung Discovered
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Eight pieces of poems and songs created during the anti-Japanese armed struggle in praise of President Kim Il Sung have newly been discovered by the Juche Literature Institute of the Academy of Social Sciences of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 They, gathered in Jilin and Heilongjiang Provinces of China, are "Paektu, Famous Mountain", "Lionhearted General", "News of Victory", "Let's Send Them to General", "Led by General", "This Is the Only Way Out", "Melody" and "Let's Fight Bravely".
					
					 The pieces represent the noble traits of the President, a great man, comparing them with the spirit and dignified features of Mt. Paektu, and praise him, who was successfully leading the anti-Japanese armed struggle, as a lionhearted general of Korea.
					
					 They also vividly reflect public feelings at that time -- deep reverence for the President, a legendary hero of the anti-Japanese armed struggle who can liberate Korea.
					
					 They are valued as precious heritages which enrich the literary treasure of the anti-Japanese revolution.
					
					 So far the institute has discovered and ascertained several dozen pieces of poems, songs and revolutionary narratives created and disseminated among people in praise of the President in vast areas along the shore of the River Amnok and in northeast China with Mt. Paektu as the centre in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.

articles.title: Many People Visit Ponghwa Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Many People Visit Ponghwa Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people of the DPRK are visiting the Ponghwa Revolutionary Site one after another with their boundless reverence for Kim Hyong Jik, an indomitable revolutionary fighter, on the occasion of the 93rd anniversary of the formation of the Korean National Association.
					 Kim Hyong Jik stayed in Ponghwa-ri from the middle of March, Juche 5 (1916) to November of next year and led the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle, taking this place as its base.
					
					 In the site there are dwelling house, spot of secret meetings in Mt. Ponghwa, ground for morning exercises, the Pisok-gye Monument, Maekjon Ferry and other relics associated with his revolutionary activities.
					
					 This year it has been visited by more than 30,000 servicepersons, working people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					 Going round the site, the visitors look back with deep emotion on the immortal revolutionary career and feats of Kim Hyong Jik who brought about the dawn of the Korean revolution, going through untrodden and thorny path of history with the noble idea of loving the country, the nation and the people.

articles.title: Natural Spring Water Abundant in Korea
articles.content:
Natural Spring Water Abundant in Korea
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Resources of natural spring water abundant in Korea have widely been used for the promotion of the people's well-being.
					 A large number of germfree natural springs with pH above 7 in alkalinity and ideal contents of minerals have been discovered in the country.
					
					 The drink stand built in the shape of natural rock between Janggun Peak and Hyangdo Peak of Mt. Paektu provides visitors with efficacious cool and hot mineral water from under Lake Chon.
					
					 Koryo Sindoksan mineral water well known as elixir of life is gushing out in Ryonggang County, Nampho City.
					
					 According to an old document of Korea, many people cultivated their strength there, taking the water.
					
					 It, known as one of the world's three famous mineral springs, is free from germ and preserves its original taste for five years.
					
					 The Ryongaksan Spring Water Factory located in the western suburbs of Pyongyang produces mineral water efficacious for chronic digestive diseases, anemia, skin diseases, diabetes and other diseases. It also gives antioxidant effect.
					
					 Tongyang and Adalsan-trademarked spring water is also popular among people.

articles.title: Benevolence Shown for Women
articles.content:
Benevolence Shown for Women
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Great benevolence was bestowed again on the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital.
					General Secretary Kim Jong Il has recently sent five tons of wild honey, several hundred kilograms of Koryo medicines, medical supplies and medical appliances and facilities to the hospital after showing such benevolence in February.
					
					 Among them are tonics including royal jelly, hawthorn nectar, barrenwort nectar and tincture of Omija (Schizandra chinensis) and facilities such as sterilizer for air purifying, instrument for infrared therapy and water defecator.
					
					 Medical workers and women are deeply moved at repeated benevolence shown by Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: US to Blame for Torpedoing Process for Solution to N. Issue
articles.content:
US to Blame for Torpedoing Process for Solution to N. Issue
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- Crowley, U.S. assistant secretary of State for Information, recently talked nonsense that the recent Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and south Korea were "annual routine ones" and "nothing surprising".  Stephens, U.S. ambassadress in Seoul, let loose rhetoric that the U.S. stands for dialogue, not the use of force, and the DPRK should respond to "talks" without delay.
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed commentary terms such outbursts sheer sophism let loose by the U.S. to justify its behavior, much upset by the repeated tough steps taken by the DPRK to cope with the exercises of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces for a nuclear war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 No matter how rhetorically the U.S. may describe the said war exercises as "annual ones", it can never conceal the offensive and aggressive nature and danger of the above-said war maneuvers, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The war exercises self-exposed that the U.S. does not have even the slightest will to make a switchover in its hostile policy toward the DPRK nor have any intention to give up its policy for stifling the DPRK by force and its scenario for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack on it.
					
					 The U.S. warmongers and the south Korean puppet forces' reckless racket for a nuclear war is gravely threatening the peace on the Korean Peninsula and again driving the process for the denuclearization of the peninsula to a collapse.
					
					 The U.S. is to blame for this. The hostile forces staged test nuclear war exercises aimed at making a surprise preemptive strike at the DPRK, while talking about "dialogue."  It is illogical for the DPRK to sit at the negotiating table with those forces to discuss the dismantlement of nuclear deterrent for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. will be held wholly accountable for having torpedoed the process for a peaceful settlement of the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.

articles.title: Japan's True Colors as N. Accomplice Stripped Naked
articles.content:
Japan's True Colors as N. Accomplice Stripped Naked
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The government of Hatoyama some days ago officially admitted the secret nuclear pact between Japan and the U.S., thus proving the criminal acts the forces of the Liberal Democratic Party committed by deceiving the world under the veil of the "three non-nuclear principles" in the past to be undeniable historical facts.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in a signed commentary carried in this regard:
					
					 The conclusion drawn from the recently disclosed documents of the secret nuclear pact between Japan and the U.S. is that the forces of the LDP of Japan are the warlike forces who have persistently pursued the nuclear ambition since the end of the war and the documents secretly worked out by them with the U.S. are criminal documents on a nuclear war related to the use of nuclear weapons in "contingency" on the Korean Peninsula, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 The Japanese militarists are set to achieve at any cost their criminal purpose with a nuclear stick any time as they are keen to launch reinvasion, blinded with extreme revengeful thoughts and ambition for overseas expansion. 
					
					 Its spearhead is directed to the DPRK. This is evidenced by the fact that the above-said documents contain clauses allowing the U.S. forces to use the bases in Japan and the U.S. forces' warships with nukes on board to make portcalls on Japan and transit through its territorial waters in "contingency" on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the U.S. has sought a chance to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK by using south Korea and Japan as its nuclear outposts.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to use Japan as an operational, logistic and sortie base and a base for nuclear attacks on the DPRK and other Asian countries in a bid to seize the whole of Korea by provoking another Korean war and establish its domination over Asia. 
					
					 This is the very reason why the U.S. imperialists deployed a huge number of nuclear weapons in south Korea and Japan and signed a secret pact with their junior ally.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are staging ceaseless war exercises of various forms in south Korea and Japan by mobilizing nuclear forces, making constant nuclear blackmail against the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK is left with no option but to bolster up its nuclear deterrent for self-defence, a treasured sword for defending the sovereignty of the country and the nation, so long as it remains exposed to the enemies' constant nuclear threat and the danger of their preemptive nuclear attack on it.

articles.title: KCNA Rebukes Hysteric Fit of Osaka Gov. Hashimoto
articles.content:
KCNA Rebukes Hysteric Fit of Osaka Gov. Hashimoto
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- There appeared one more psychopath in the Japanese political circle. He is Governor of Osaka Prefecture Hashimoto. His way of thinking and manner of speaking cannot be regarded as normal.
					 This guy malignantly spoke ill of the DPRK and its system, calling them "illegal state" and "Nazis" and likened the Koreans including the Korean residents in Japan to the German nation in the past in a bid to openly justify Japan's discrimination against the Korean schools in Japan.
					
					 This was nothing but a hysteric fit of the guy steeped in bitterness toward the DPRK to the marrow of his bones. It is the 21st century.
					
					 Gone are the days when there prevailed law and system justifying national discrimination. It is anachronistic and reactionary sophism to assert discrimination against other nation on our planet.
					
					 Hashimoto, however, made such remarks inciting racial discrimination in broad daylight, stunning the people. He might have lost his sense.
					
					 His assertions, in a nutshell, mean that national discrimination against the Koreans is unavoidable as they are just the same as the German nation at the time of the Nazis rule.
					
					 Is it conceivable that the above-said remarks were made by the politician representing one prefecture of Japan?
					
					 Whoever claims to be a politician should have common sense and be logical in any statement.
					
					 What Hashimoto said, however, is full of contradictions. He is an imbecile, a political charlatan and a wicked guy without an equal in the world as he is free to make reckless remarks without any elementary common sense of history and logic.
					
					 Much upset by ceaseless protest and denunciation of his outbursts by the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), the Koreans in Japan and Japanese public, he visited the Korean school in Osaka on March 12 and expressed apology that "he was very sorry for creating furor by making inadvertent remarks."
					
					 What is intolerable is that no sooner had he left the school than let loose a spate of such sophism as admonishing the school to cut off its relations with Chongryon and provide its students with information about "Takeshima", "Sea of Japan" and "abduction", etc. to suit the specific conditions of Japan.
					
					 This is an unpardonable human rights abuse and fascist tyranny aimed to deprive Korean children of their national spirit, prevent them from having any relations with the homeland through Chongryon and make them "Imperial subjects" of modern type meekly executing Japan's policy of reinvasion.
					
					 If there be any Nazis country on the earth today, it is only Japan where wicked, crafty and shameless ultranationalists openly incite discrimination and domination over other nation.
					
					 No wonder, the Social-Democratic Party, the People's New Party and other political parties as well as people from all walks of life in Japan are becoming increasingly assertive demanding a stop to the discrimination against the Korean schools.
					
					 Hashimoto will never be able to escape a stern punishment by history if he persists in his criminal acts of hurting the inviolable dignity of the DPRK and antagonizing Chongryon and the Koreans in Japan in defiance of the domestic and foreign public opinion.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Ballyhooing about "Adherence to Principle" Ridiculed
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Ballyhooing about "Adherence to Principle" Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- If the south Korean puppet authorities persistently stand in confrontation with the DPRK under the signboard of "adhering to principle", going against the trend of the times and the aspiration of the fellow countrymen, they will have to pay a dear price for it in the long run, warns Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a signed article.
					 Their noisily trumpeted "adherence to principle" is, in essence, a revelation of a sinister attempt to invariably pursue a confrontation policy just as they have done so far under the signboard of the so-called "principle" in an effort to steadily escalate the confrontation with the DPRK and bring the inter-Korean relations back to those in the past era of confrontation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities' loud-mouthed "adherence to principle" is nothing but a criminal motto of confrontation as it is intended to drive the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe and a version of their scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK aimed at stifling fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 It is the real aim sought by the south Korean puppet authorities in trumpeting about "adherence to principle" to keep the inter-Korean relations in the state of acute confrontation and render the situation  extremely tense and, furthermore, ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK at any cost in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 The history of the inter-Korean relations knows no such group of wicked traitors opposed to reunification as the present conservative group of south Korea which is hell-bent on the moves for confrontation and war to do harm to fellow countrymen and stifle them in collusion with foreign forces, denying dialogue, cooperation and reunification.
					
					 The conservative group's ballyhooing about "adherence to principle" will only sound as a dirge precipitating its disgraceful ruin.
					
					 The Koreans will never be able to achieve the cause of the independent national reunification nor will they be able to escape national calamities and war disasters as long as the group of traitors are allowed to stay in power.

articles.title: World Meteorological Day Observed
articles.content:
World Meteorological Day Observed
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- It is a vital issue for people to correctly monitor the change of the atmosphere under the present situation where the climatic change poses a serious problem, observes Minju Joson Tuesday in a signed article dedicated to World Meteorological Day which falls on today.
					 There are a lot of problems to be solved in the field of meteorological observation, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The accuracy of the meteorological observation has not yet been ensured fully and in a more detailed manner. Worse still, catastrophic consequences of the weather phenomena are not forecast in good time.
					
					 What is more serious is the fact that different countries of the world are aware of the serious nature of the climatic change, but fail to be positive enough to take decisive measures to solve the problem, seeking their immediate interests only, and united actions are not fully taken for international cooperation.
					
					 However, the inexhaustible efforts of humankind to remake nature as required by it will surely bring about big progress in this field in the days ahead and it will not only effectively control the climatic change but actively meet various natural and climatic conditions.

articles.title: Repression in S. Korea Condemned
articles.content:
Repression in S. Korea Condemned
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification issued a statement on Mar. 19 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' repressive campaign on the strength of the fascist law.
					 The statement recalled that the Kyonggi provincial police office walked off Hong Kap Phyo, ex-chairman of the Society for National Spirit and advisor to the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, on the charge of violation of the "National Security Law" and searched his house on Mar. 18.
					
					 This repressive action was taken for the reason that he "praised the north", it pointed out, adding that nobody will be free from being arrested under the NSL if things go on in that way.
					
					 It charged that the sycophantic traitorous forces are restricting the freedom of the people and checking the democratization of society and the progress of history while incriminating every act of acknowledging the realities in the DPRK.
					
					 Holding that an immediate halt should be put to such frantic violent suppression as violating the freedom of thinking and expression, the statement urged the present authorities to apologize for the recent crackdown and set free the detained at once.
					
					 It called upon all the people to strongly denounce the dictatorial forces' persistent repression on the pretext of public security and wage a vigorous struggle for democracy against fascism.

articles.title: Demo against Sycophancy towards Japan Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Demo against Sycophancy towards Japan Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean students staged a surprise demonstration in front of the "Chongwadae" on March 19 to accuse the puppet chief executive of his sycophantic and treacherous remarks to serve Japan. 
					 Recalling that different circles of south Korea are infuriated by the reckless remarks made by the present chief executive about Tok Islets, the demonstrators declared people can expect nothing from "the government." 
					
					 The man who reneged on his responsibility and obligation should not be allowed to stay in power any longer, they stressed, urging him to probe the truth behind it without delay. 
					
					 When they started a demonstration, policemen brutally cracked down upon and arrested many of them. 
					
					 Braving police arrest, students shouted such slogans as "His reckless remarks on Tok Islets are serious enough to be impeached!" and "We would like to question him why did he make such foolish remarks about Tok Islets!" and scattered literature condemning the pro-Japanese lackey.

articles.title: Measure for Assisting Korean Schools Called for in Japan
articles.content:
Measure for Assisting Korean Schools Called for in Japan
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A letter of request was sent to the Japanese prime minister on March 18 by the "Association of University Teachers Calling for Applying the Tuition-free Program for Senior High Schools to the Korean Schools in Japan" made up of professors and lecturers of different universities in Japan. 
					The letter containing signatures of nearly 1,000 persons strongly urged the government to give the students of the Korean schools in Japan an opportunity to receive assistance, too.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Birthday Commemorated in Czech
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Birthday Commemorated in Czech
 Pyongyang, March 23 (KCNA) -- A meeting, a book and photo exhibition and a film show were held in the Czech Republic on Mar. 15 on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, the birthday of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venue of the events were works of Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il and photos on their undying exploits and photos of the Korean people in the efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting.
					
					 The honorary chairman of the Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association said that the world progressives, together with the Korean people, commemorate the birthday of Kim Il Sung, the prominent leader of the Korean and the world revolution, in most humble reverence.
					
					 He praised Kim Il Sung as a peerlessly great man who liberated Korea from the Japanese imperialists' occupation of more than four decades and led to victory the Korean War, ignited by the U.S. imperialists, to save the destiny of the Korean nation.
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the immortal Juche idea and built a powerful socialist state in Korea under its banner, he stressed, adding:
					
					 The Korean people are now working hard to build a thriving socialist nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We wish for the successful realization of the cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was the Korean film "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation".

articles.title: RPDC decide llevar a juicio al ciudadano norteamericano
articles.content:
RPDC decide llevar a juicio al ciudadano norteamericano
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- El organo competente de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio enjuiciar al ciudadano norteamericano Aijalon Mahli Gomes (nacido el 19 de junio de 1979 y residente en Boston del Estado de Massachussets), quien ha entrado ilegalmente en la RPDC, por su crimen confirmado.

articles.title: Traidores seran sentenciados severamente, advierte vocero de CNR
articles.content:
Traidores seran sentenciados severamente, advierte vocero de CNR
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- En estos dias, la banda titere conservadora surcoreana libra perversamente las maniobras intrigantes para confrontarse con la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, usando a los fugitivos al Sur de Corea y otras basuras humanas como brigada de choque.
					En relacion con eso, el vocero del Comite Nacional por la Reconciliacion hizo publica el dia 23 una declaracion que senala como sigue:
					
					Por su conducta, esta banda titere, enloquecida por la confrontacion con la RPDC, se hace de un objeto de burla del interior y exterior.
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos agrupan a los fugitivos describiendolos de la "fuerza futura para la reunificacion" y otras con el fin de fabricar la supuesta "Alianza libre por el movimiento del Norte de Corea", "Solidaridad de hombres intelectuales NK" y otras entidades intrigantes anti-RPDC, por una parte y por la otra, organizan el comite preparatorio para la constitucion del partido politico "Solidaridad de hombres por la reunificacion" y pretenden presentarla en las "elecciones de autonomia local".
					
					Ademas, aumentan notablemente el presupuesto para el "apoyo de fugitivos del Norte de Corea" mientras que disminuyen el otro para la cooperacion con el Norte, crean mucho mas en todas las localidades surcoreanas el "Centro Hana", base de educacion en lavado de cerebro y la de intriga para los "fugitivos del Norte de Corea". Y el ministro de "Reunificacion" Hyon In Thaek y otros relacionados de autoridades visitan a ellos para "felicitar", "estimular" y "apoyar".
					
					Instigan a las basuras humanas a echar maldiciones sobre la RPDC mediante la "emision por la transformacion del Norte de Corea", la "emision abierta del Norte de Corea", "Daily NK" y otros organos de propaganda intrigante contra el Norte de Corea. Ademas hacen organizar en las unidades del ejercito titere y en el extranjero la supuesta "conferencia sobre la seguridad", "entrevista", "simposio" y otros donde desacreditan a la RPDC, ejecutar la funcion de la "opera" y la del "conjunto artistico" y escribir novelas y notas, inclusive lanzar volantes.
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que en contubernio con las basuras humanas, los titeres surcoreanos recurren con ojos inyectados de sangre a los actos de espionaje e intriga contra la RPDC y censuran la situacion interna de la RPDC asi como   disgustos de eso, no vacilan en atreverse a insultar la direccion suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Los cabecillas de Estados Unidos se encontraron en la Casa Blanca y el Congreso con los traidores y los fugitivos y les otorgaron el "premio", y las entidades intrigantes de DDHH de EE.UU. contra la RPDC apoyan activamente en lo financiero las actividades de los fugitivos.
					
					Tambien, los reaccionarios japoneses visitaron a las basuras humanas en el Sur de Corea y las invitaron a su pais y les estimulan transmitiendo la desinformacion a traves de los medios oficiales de prensa luego de aceptar sus palabrerias.
					
					La chusma de los que se escaparon al Sur de Corea y a EE.UU. bajo la tutela de la banda  titere conservadora surcoreana y los imperialistas norteamericanos y japoneses toma parte activa en esa campana intrigante anti-RPDC soltando improperios de toda indole sobre esta a fin de mantener su sucia vida con la suma  de dinero insignificante que le tiran los segundos.
					
					Nadie hara caso a los chismes de esos traidores porque todos saben que son inventados y carentes de credito.
					
					Esta claro que de la boca de las escorias humanas solo salen insultos repugnantes como reza el refran coreano: no hay cuervo que no grazne.
					
					Son igualmente miserables esas basuras humanas que se hicieron cadaveres vivos politicamente por sus actos traidores siendo senalados con el indice acusador de la gente y los que lanzan la campana intrigante anti-RPDC basandose en los chismes de las primeras.
					
					EE.UU. y la camarilla titere surcoreana fingen brindar ayuda a los fugitivos norcoreanos bajo el rotulo de la defensa de los "derechos humanos" y calificandolos de "damificados".
					
					Pero, ya esta conocido por todo el mundo que ellos son delincuentes profugos o los que traicionaron a la patria abandonando a su familia, padres, hermanos y amigos en busca de los bienes egoistas.
					
					Esas malditas basuras humanas mas abominables del mundo no tienen ni un pedazo de conciencia u obligacion moral del ser humano porque algun tiempo daban !Vivas! a las gratas politicas socialistas como la educacion y la asistencia medica gratuitas y cometieron su felonia cuando se hizo dificil la vida debido a las desesperadas maniobras anti-RPDC de los enemigos externos e internos.
					
					Parece que la banda de titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios norteamericanos y japoneses estuvieron tan avidas de las desinformaciones anti-RPDC que no tuvieron otro remedio que contar hasta con esa chusma. 
					
					Este hecho significa el fracaso amargo de ellos en la confrontacion con la RPDC. 
					
					Cuanto menos escorias humanas como los "fugitivos", tanto mas pura sera la RPDC y mas solida la unidad monolitica del pueblo coreano.
					
					La banda de titeres surcoreanos, EE.UU. y Japon deben darse cuenta de que no les saldra nada bueno si siguen recurriendo a las jugadas sucias y vergonzosas, que deshonrarian a ellos mismos siendo ridiculizadas, como el engano, la seduccion, el secuestro y la demagogia.
					
					 Bajo la autorizacion, a nombre de la RPDC y la nacion coreana, se advierte categoricamente a los traidores y desertores sucios, que pasaron al lado de los enemigos, que se abalanzan rechinando los dientes contra la RPDC, y  se ofrecen como brigada avanzada de la demagogia contra esta ayudando a los enemigos sin saber quien les habia criado y quien es el destructor de su regimen y vida, que seran los primeros en ser enjuiciados severamente y ejecutados por la nacion.
					
					El pueblo de la RPDC y los demas integrantes de la nacion coreana nunca perdonaran a esos fulanos y menganos degenerados como lacayos de los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios de EE.UU. y Japon en la sucia campana intrigante anti-RPDC y de los elementos internos y externos que se oponen a la reunificacion.

articles.title: Minju Joson inculpa a EE.UU. de impedir solucion de problema nuclear
articles.content:
Minju Joson inculpa a EE.UU. de impedir solucion de problema nuclear
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- Hace poco, el asistente del secretario de Estado para la informacion de Estados Unidos, Crowley, dijo que los recien concluidos ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" fueron "rutinarios y anuales" y no eran para "tanta sorpresa". Por otra parte, la embajadora estadounidense en el Sur de Corea, Stephens, disparateo que EE.UU. no apoya el uso de las fuerzas sino el dialogo, por lo tanto, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea debe acudir cuanto antes a las "conversaciones".
					 Estos dichos no pasan de ser una sofisteria que difunde EE.UU. para justificar sus acciones siendo perplejo ante las medidas duras tomadas sucesivamente por la RPDC frente a esos ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra esta.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido el dia 23 y continua:
					
					Aunque EE.UU. describe obstinadamente esos ejercicios militares conjuntos como "anuales", no podra disimular de ninguna manera su caracter ofensivo, agresivo y peligroso.
					
					En esa ocasion, EE.UU. demostro que no tiene ni la minima voluntad de cambiar su politica hostil a la RPDC consistente en atropellarla por la fuerza, en particular, mediante al ataque preventivo nuclear.
					
					Debido a la imprudente campana de guerra nuclear de los belicistas de EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos, la paz de la Peninsula Coreana se ve gravemente amenazada y el proceso de desnuclearizacion de esta region corre otra vez el riesgo de fracaso.
					
					La responsabilidad de tal situacion recae enteramente a EE.UU.
					
					Resulta muy absurdo debatir la renuncia al disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa con esas fuerzas hostiles que hablan del "dialogo" superficialmente y libran de hecho los ejercicios de ensayo de guerra nuclear para atacar sorpresiva y preventivamente a la RPDC.
					
					EE.UU. tendra que responsabilizarse de todas las consecuencias del fracaso del proceso de solucion pacifica del problema nuclear de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun revela la naturaleza de Japon, complice nuclear
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun revela la naturaleza de Japon, complice nuclear
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- Recientemente el gobierno de Hatoyama reconocio oficialmente la promesa secreta nuclear entre Japon y EE.UU., por lo cual fue revelado como hecho historico innegable el acto criminal de las fuerzas del Partido Democratico Liberal de Japon que ha enganado al mundo bajo el rotulo de los "3 principios de desnuclearizacion" en el pasado.
					 Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este martes y continua:
					
					 Mediante los recien descubiertos documentos de promesa nuclear Japon-EE.UU. se da la conclusion de que las fuerzas del partido politico arriba mencionado son la banda de belicistas que ha perseguido con tenacidad su ambicion nuclear invariable en la posguerra.
					
					 Igualmente se puso al desnudo que los documentos elaborados en secreto bajo la conspiracion con EE.UU. devienen estrictamente los para guerra nuclear criminal relacionados con el uso de armas nucleares en la "emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Los militaristas islenos que se proponen forzar la nueva agresion presos del extremo sentimiento de venganza y la ambicion de expansion al ultramar, estan maquinando para realizar a toda costa su objetivo criminal con el garrote nuclear.
					
					 Su flecha principal se dirige a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. Lo comprueba el hecho de que susodichos documentos incluyen los articulos como el empleo de la base japonesa de las fuerzas armadas norteamericanas y el permiso de la vuelta al puerto de Japon y el paso del mar territorial de este pais isleno de los buques norteamericanos cargados de armas nucleares en la "emergencia" de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  La RPDC no puede menos que cuestionar gravemente tambien el acto criminal del imperio que ha acechado una oportunidad para asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear a esta tomando el Sur de Corea y Japon por bases avanzadas nucleares.
					
					  EE.UU. abriga la ambicion de ocuparse de la Peninsula Coreana con la provocacion de nueva guerra coreana y de asumir el dominio sobre Asia.
					
					Especificamente intenta valerse de Japon como base de operacion, abastecimientos militares, salida y ataque nuclear contra la RPDC y otros paises  asiaticos.
					
					 He aqui la razon que los imperialistas yanquis emplazaron las inmensas armas nucleares en el Sur de Corea y Japon e hicieron la promesa secreta  nuclear con su aliado inferior.
					
					  Los imperialistas norteamericanos se ocupan de  la amenaza y chantaje nucleares contra la RPDC librando incesantemente los ejercicios belicos de varios tipos en el Sur de Corea y Japon bajo la participacion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					 Mientras sigan las maniobras de amenaza nuclear y ataque preventivo nuclear de los enemigos, se fortalecera mas el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo de la RPDC, espada preciosa para defender la soberania del pais y la nacion.

articles.title: ATCC comenta conducta histerica del gobernador de Osaka
articles.content:
ATCC comenta conducta histerica del gobernador de Osaka
Pyongyang, 23 de marzo (ATCC) -- Aparecio otro psicopata en el circulo politico de Japon. Es el gobernador de la prefectura de Osaka, Hashimoto.
					Recientemente, al censurar el Estado y el regimen de la RPDC calificandolos de "ilegal" y "nazismo", justifico publicamente la discriminacion a las escuelas coreanas en su pais comparando a la nacion coreana, incluso los coreanos residentes en Japon, con la alemana del siglo pasado. 
					
					El comportamiento de ese histerico colmado de la conciencia hostil a Corea no concuerda al actual siglo 21.
					
					Hace mucho tiempo, se abolieron las leyes y sistemas que justificaban la discriminacion nacional.
					
					En cualquier parte del mundo es considerada de anacronica y reaccionaria la defensa abierta de la discriminacion a otras naciones.
					
					Sin embargo, Hashimoto pronuncio ese chisme xenofoba a plena luz del dia dejando aturdido a todo el mundo.
					
					En una palabra, su opinion consiste en que no se puede evitar la discriminacion sobre la nacion coreana porque esta es igual a la de Alemania nazista.
					
					?Como es posible que hable de esa manera un politico responsable de una region japonesa?
					
					Es debido que un politico observe las referencias y la logica en sus dichos. Pero, las palabras de Hashimoto son del todo contradictorias.
					
					Este estafador politico tan bajo y bruto no tiene ni los elementales conocimientos de referencia sobre la historia y la logica.
					
					Cuando la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos en Japon), los coreanos residentes en este pais y el circulo social japones le dirigieron una lluvia de criticas y protestas por sus dichos, Hashimoto visito el 12 de marzo a una escuela coreana en Osaka y escenifico la farsa de excusarse diciendo que "se sentia muy apenado por haber causado el disturbio con sus palabras dichas sin ese proposito".
					
					Pero, tan pronto como salio de la escuela, disparateo que la escuela coreana debe romper las relaciones con la Chongryon y ensenar a los alumnos sobre "Takeshima", "Mar de Japon", "secuestro" y otras cosas convenientes a la realidad de Japon. 
					
					Esto es el imperdonable crimen de violacion de DDHH y la arbitrariedad fascista para privar a los ninos coreanos de su espiritu nacional, romperles todos los vinculos con la patria (RPDC) que se establecen por conducto de la Chongryon y convertirlos en los "ciudadanos japoneses" de cuno moderno que obedezcan docilmente a la politica de los reaccionarios japoneses de lanzar de nuevo la agresion.
					
					Si en nuestro planeta existe todavia un Estado nazista, ese sera Japon donde los ultranacionalistas tan sucios, astutos y descarados inculcan abiertamente la xenofobia y la dominacion a otras naciones.
					
					Mientras tanto, el Partido Social Democratico, el Nuevo Partido del Pueblo y otros partidos politicos de Japon y los habitantes de distintos estratos de la sociedad japonesa alzan sus voces en demanda del cese de la discriminacion a las escuelas coreanas.
					
					Si Hashimoto continua con sus maniobras criminales contra la Chongryon y los coreanos residentes en Japon dando espaldas a la opinion publica interna y externa y mellando la dignidad de la sagrada RPDC, sera condenado gravemente por la historia.
